item.title: “NBC is protecting the show because it’s their new money maker, but Kelly has no clue how unhappy her staff is.”
item.author: PopBase

item.title:
11 current and former employees from ‘The Kelly Clarkson Show’ tell Rolling Stone that they are overworked, underpaid, and verbally abused by the producers behind the scenes.
Kelly is not aware of the toxic environment, according to the employees, and is said to be ‘fantastic.’
item.author: PopBase

item.title: ‘Teenage Dream’ by Katy Perry re-enters the UK Official Albums chart at #38, following her Coronation concert performance.
item.author: PopBase

item.title: ‘Speak Now‘ by Taylor Swift jumps 54 spots to #23 on this week's UK Official Albums chart, following Taylor's Version announcement.
item.author: PopBase

item.title: Conan Gray will release new single ‘NEVER ENDING SONG’ on May 19th.
item.author: PopBase

item.title: Miley Cyrus stuns in newly shared photo.
item.author: PopBase
